text:
Risk.Ident | Scala Developer | VISA, ONSITE | Hamburg, Germany | Relocation | 50-75K EUR

Risk Ident is a software product development organization that offers anti-fraud solutions to companies within the e-commerce, telecommunications, and financial sectors.

Some of the technologies we use: Scala, Python, ML, JavaScript, Postgres, Ansible, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Kafka. We have openings across our engineering teams.

Apply at https://riskident.com/en/jobs/ or email me directly.
